directions: Blend cream cheese and butter in a food processor until smooth, 10 to 15 pulses. Scrape down sides of bowl. Add cognac, lemon juice, onion, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, salt, and pepper to cream cheese mixture; pulse until blended, scraping down sides 2 to 3 times.
Sprinkle fish into cream cheese mixture and pulse just until blended. Transfer pate to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until chilled, 3 hours to overnight.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1/2 pound skinless, boneless smoked bluefish, flaked
title: Pocasset Smoked Bluefish Pate
